name: Driftland: The Magic Revival - Soundtrack
detailed_description:
Driftland: The Magic Revival - Original Game Soundtrack

The music in Driftland adapts to in-game events, it's mixed in real time, and consists of many layers (stems). Each of the four races has individual music that emphasizes its character.
The soundtrack was mixed so that it would be a musical🎵 journey through the moods that you can experience during the game.

Track List:

01 - Pure Heart
02 - Story of the Elder's One
03 - Flowing Sky
04 - Brotherly Bonds
05 - Night Watcher
06 - Dark Shards
07 - The Last Wrath
08 - Red Moon
09 - Betrayal and the Beast
10 - Dread Lord
11 - Timeless River
12 - Emerald Path (Salane)
13 - Together We Are Stronger
14 - Abyss of Flame (Yr Thagaradur)
15 - Legacy of the Iron Peak
16 - Circle of Life

[h1]How to play downloaded Soundtrack DLC:[/h1]
1. Please select Music from the Library tab in the Steam client.
2. From the list of available albums, choose Driftland: The Magic Revival - Soundtrack.
3. Press the PLAY ALBUM button to start the Steam music player

[h1]How to find Soundtrack files:[/h1]
1. Please select Music from the Library tab in the Steam client.
2. From the list of available albums, choose Driftland: The Magic Revival - Soundtrack.
3. Choose the SHOW IN SYSTEM below PLAY ALBUM button to open the folder with the Soundtrack files in mp3 format.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 or Intel Core i3 (3 Ghz)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon 7970 or NVIDIA GeForce 770 or or equivalent DirectX 11 card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16bit sound card
